hep.aida
Interface ITextStyle

All Superinterfaces:
IBaseStyle, IBrushStyle
public interface ITextStyle
extends IBrushStyle

Style for all text (e.g. axis labels, legend box text etc.)

Author:
The AIDA team (http://aida.freehep.org/)
